#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char a[100000],t,i,j,ch;
    int count=0,max=0,ascii;
    cin>>a;
    for(i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
    {
        if(a[i]==a[i+1])
        count++;
        else
        count=1;
        if(count>max)
        {
            ch=a[i];
            max=count;
        }
        else if(count==max)
        {
            if(int(ch)>int(a[i]))
            {ch=a[i];max=count;}

        }

    }cout<<ch<<endl<<max<<endl;
}
